scripts.build: npm run generate-develop && graph build subgraph.mumbai-develop.yaml
scripts.codegen: npm run generate-develop && graph codegen subgraph.mumbai-develop.yaml
scripts.deploy-local-release: npm run generate-release && graph deploy --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 startbahn/startrail-mumbai-release subgraph.release.yaml
scripts.deploy-local-develop: npm run generate-develop && graph deploy --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 startbahn/startrail-mumbai-develop subgraph.develop.yaml
scripts.deploy-gke-develop: npm run generate-develop && graph deploy --ipfs https://subgraph-qa-lum.startbahn.jp/ipfs/ --node https://subgraph-qa-lum.startbahn.jp/admin/ startbahn/startrail-mumbai-develop subgraph.develop.yaml
scripts.deploy-gke-release: npm run generate-release && graph deploy --ipfs https://subgraph-qa-lum.startbahn.jp/ipfs/ --node https://subgraph-qa-lum.startbahn.jp/admin/ startbahn/startrail-mumbai-release subgraph.release.yaml
scripts.deploy-gke-master: npm run generate-master && graph deploy --ipfs https://subgraph.startrail.io/ipfs/ --node https://subgraph.startrail.io/admin/ startbahn/startrail subgraph.mainnet.yaml
scripts.deploy-develop: npm run generate-develop && graph deploy --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ startbahn/startrail-mumbai-develop --access-token $TOKEN subgraph.develop.yaml
scripts.deploy-release: npm run generate-release && graph deploy --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ startbahn/startrail-mumbai-release --access-token $TOKEN subgraph.release.yaml
scripts.deploy-master: npm run generate-master && graph deploy --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ startbahn/startrail --access-token $TOKEN subgraph.mainnet.yaml
